name: Postal Insanity
description:
Postal Insanity is a 3d horror game where you have to sort packages. The twist is if the packages pile up you go insane. Going insane causes paranormal events to happen, and if you go too insane you die.

Controls:

WASD: Move Around

Mouse to look around

Look and click to pick up and put down objects

Scroll to move held object closer or farther
